solution_line_template: Since Randy wants to get an average of {desired_average}, then the sum of the {total_quizzes} quizzes should be {desired_average} x {total_quizzes} = <<{desired_average}*{total_quizzes}={required_sum}>>{required_sum}.
The sum of Randy's score for the first four quizzes is {quiz1} + {quiz2} + {quiz3} + {quiz4} = <<{quiz1}+{quiz2}+{quiz3}+{quiz4}={sum_first_four}>>{sum_first_four}.
Thus, Randy needs to get {required_sum} - {sum_first_four} = <<{required_sum}-{sum_first_four}={fifth_quiz_score}>>{fifth_quiz_score} in his fifth quiz.
